Package it.uninsubria.server.dao.impl

Class BookDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.server.dao.impl.BookDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BookDAO
public class BookDAOImpl extends Object implements BookDAO
Implementation of BookDAO for database operations on Book entities.
